sorcer.service

Interface Jobber

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceJobber

    public interface Jobber
extends Service, Remote
    A service coordinating a Job execution by creating a runtime federation of all needed service providers to execute all component exertions of the received job.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface sorcer.service.Service

        service, service
